sentences.en: I have already learned so much from Armin Veh and I will work closely with Rainer.
sentences.cn: 我已经从阿尔明·费那里学到了很多东西,我也将会和赖纳紧密合作.

sentences.en: In his new role Babbel will have the experienced Rainer Widmayer alongside him as coach.
sentences.cn: 经验丰富的赖纳·维德迈尔将作为助教来帮助巴贝尔担任他的新角色.

sentences.en: Rainer Maria Rilke and Yeats , Eliot 1, known as the three great modern European poets.
sentences.cn: 里尔克与叶芝 、 艾略特一道, 被誉为欧洲现代的三位伟大的诗人.

trans.tran_cn: 喷灌装置，人工降雨装置
